document_name_accent: viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json
subsection_content: Ankle synovitis is a condition that causes pain, discomfort and directly affects daily activities. Specifically, the synovium at this location are small fluid-filled sacs that perform the task of reducing friction between tendons and bones. These include: Achilles, Retrocalcaneal, and Medial Malleolus, which can be inflamed independently or at the same time. (first)
subsection_title: viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json. What is ankle synovitis?
subsection_data:
viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json. What is ankle synovitis?
Ankle synovitis is a condition that causes pain, discomfort and directly affects daily activities. Specifically, the synovium at this location are small fluid-filled sacs that perform the task of reducing friction between tendons and bones. These include: Achilles, Retrocalcaneal, and Medial Malleolus, which can be inflamed independently or at the same time. (first)
